inclusion.criterion: Severe aortic stenosis (aortic valve area <1.0cm2 or aortic valve area index <0.6 cm2/m2)
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: repeat echo confirmed critical aortic stenosis showing left ventricular hypertrophy with cavity dilation and severe global hypokinesis, severe aortic valve stenosis with underlying bicuspid aortic valve

exclusion.criterion: Severe valvular disease other than AS.
exclusion.label: does_not_trigger
exclusion.evidence: severe aortic stenosis with underlying bicuspid aortic valve, dilated ascending aorta

exclusion.criterion: Significant coronary heart disease requiring revascularisation.
exclusion.label: does_not_trigger
exclusion.evidence: cardiac cath with right heart cath to evaluate his pulm art pressures which showed no angiographically apparent flow-limiting coronary artery disease

exclusion.criterion: Other medical conditions that limits life expectancy or precludes SAVR or TAVI.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient's EF was 25%, but no mention of other medical conditions limiting life expectancy. No information on renal function, CMR contraindications, or cardiomyopathy.
